mapper.select: SELECT iboard FROM product_list WHERE category_num = ${isubcategory} ORDER BY iboard ASC
SELECT * FROM product_list WHERE iboard = ${iboard} ORDER BY iboard DESC
SELECT * FROM product_list A INNER JOIN t_board_sub_category B ON A.category_num = B.isubcategory WHERE iboard = ${iboard}
SELECT * FROM product_list A INNER JOIN product_detail B ON A.iboard = B.iboard WHERE A.iboard = ${iboard}
SELECT * FROM product_list A INNER JOIN product_detail B ON A.iboard = B.iboard WHERE A.iboard = ${iboard} AND B.color = ${color}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_list WHERE category_num = ${isubcategory}

SELECT A.iuser, A.sm, A.md, A.lg, A.xl, A.color, A.iboard, A.icart, B.iuser, C.img_url_big, C.title, C.price FROM cart A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser INNER JOIN product_list C ON A.iboard = C.iboard WHERE B.iuser = ${iuser}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE iuser = ${iuser} AND checked = 1;
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM product_list WHERE title LIKE '%${title}%' ORDER BY iboard DESC LIMIT ${page}, ${amount}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_list WHERE title LIKE '%${title}%'
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET sm = sm + 1 SET md = md + 1 SET lg = lg + 1 SET xl = xl + 1 WHERE icart = ${icart}
UPDATE cart SET sm = sm - 1 SET md = md - 1 SET lg = lg - 1 SET xl = xl - 1 WHERE icart = ${icart}
